summary.span: 在 控件中定义数据项与该数据项绑定到的节点之间的关系。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，其中每个数据项包含多个字段 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），一个节点显示返回的值`ToString`的数据项，默认情况下的方法。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的树中，否则不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 通过指定的树节点绑定，可以绑定到的特定字段的节点的属性。You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings. A对象定义的每个数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to. 控制存储其中的对象属性并将绑定应用于要创建树层次结构和数据源层次结构之间的一对一关系的数据源。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 为数据源中的每个数据项控件尝试匹配数据项目写入到才能创建相应的对象对象。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object in order to create the corresponding object. 在创建时对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 条件指示当数据项应绑定到的节点。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 你可以指定或属性或这两个属性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 通过指定没有略微的性能提升。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 节点深度指定获取绑定的节点级别。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，以下声明绑定`Name`和`ID`字段的数据源到和属性，分别的所有节点的深度为 0:For example, the following declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示接口) 公开属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a interface) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 数据成员时数据源包含多个数据项目类型，指定的数据项目类型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 以下声明绑定``元素控件添加到树中，而不考虑层次结构中的位置中的所有节点：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 一旦建立绑定条件时，你可以随后绑定的属性可以绑定到一个值的对象。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 当绑定到静态值，所有对象向其应用对象共享相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写中的绑定的属性通过在节点上直接设置对应的属性的对象。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node. 下表列出的属性允许您绑定的属性的类数据项的字段的对象。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的字段属性对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出的属性允许您绑定的属性的类为静态值的对象。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果冲突定义对象，控件适用以下优先顺序中的树节点绑定：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 对象定义并匹配仅的深度。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （此类型的树节点绑定适用于在树中的所有节点。）(This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.) 5. 数据源中没有匹配项的对象。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在此情况下，通过返回的值`ToString`数据项方法然后绑定到和了节点属性应用对象。In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the nodes to which the object is applied. 类还允许您通过设置显示在节点的文本格式属性。The class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the property. ## Examples 下表显示绑定声明的某些示例树节点。The following table shows some example tree node binding declarations. |示例绑定Example binding|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |``|将绑定和到树中的所有节点的属性`Title`和`ID`字段的数据源，分别。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data source, respectively. 因为所有节点都使用此树节点绑定声明和未设置属性。All nodes use this tree node binding declaration because the and properties are not set.| |``|将绑定和到树中的所有节点的属性`Title`和`ID`字段`Book`在数据源中，会分别项数据。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|将绑定和所有节点的深度为 2 的关系树中的属性`Title`和`ID`在数据源中，会分别项的数据的字段。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|将绑定和所有节点的深度为 2 的关系树中的属性`Title`和`ID`字段`Book`在数据源中，会分别项数据。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively. 此外会将绑定为静态值节点的属性。Also binds the property of the nodes to a static value.| 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象以声明方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The first code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用对象以编程方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The second code example demonstrates how to use objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第三个代码示例提供的第一个和第二个代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The third code example provides sample XML data for the first and second code examples. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象以声明方式来定义节点和数据项之间的关系。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. value.span: 与数据项的 属性进行匹配以确定是否应用树节点绑定的值。

span.span: The value to match against a data item's property to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到节点的 XML 元素。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到节点的 XML 元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 对于此代码示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this code example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，指定 对象应用到的节点的文本显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式字符串，指定 对象应用到的节点的文本显示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性用于为节点的文本提供自定义格式。The property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text. 数据格式字符串包含的形式，以冒号分隔的两个部分 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，在格式设置字符串`{0:F2}`显示一个带两位小数定点数。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 因为每个节点中只有一个值，此值可以设置只为 0。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|显示数字值在Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|货币格式。Currency format.| |`D`|十进制格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科学记数 （指数） 格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定的格式。Fixed format.| |`G`|常规格式。General format.| |`N`|数值格式。Number format.| |`X`|十六进制格式。Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除`X`，格式字符不区分大小写。Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive. `X`格式字符在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 值属性，设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of the property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的根节点中显示的文本的自定义显示格式。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the text that is displayed in the root node. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的根节点中显示的文本的自定义显示格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the text that is displayed in the root node. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingFormatString/CS/treenodebindingformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingFormatString/VB/treenodebindingformatstringvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是前面示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example is sample XML data for the preceding example. ```
```

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示未设置 P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip 属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的值属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 当节点旁边显示映像时，当鼠标指针定位图像上方时显示的工具提示文本。When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用属性将相同的工具提示文本绑定到每个节点映像，你可以将绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using the property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性指定到的节点旁边显示的图像的工具提示文本应用对象。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the object is applied. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定到的节点旁边显示的图像的工具提示文本应用对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Booklist.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的自定义映像属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 图像将显示在节点旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端浏览器支持该格式。The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置重写的图像的单个节点及其直接属性。You can override the image for an individual node by setting its property directly. 除了使用此属性绑定到每个节点的同一个映像，可以将绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using this property to bind the same image to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 显示的节点旁边的映像时属性，还应考虑设置属性。When displaying an image next to a node with the property, you should also consider setting the property. 你指定的工具提示文本提供了辅助技术设备可用于使控件更易于访问的映像的说明。The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性，将应用对象在特定节点深度。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a object at a specific node depth. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定到的节点的自定义图像应用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for a node to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Booklist.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的 URL属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the URL to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 当设置此属性时，控件显示的节点，而不是纯文本的文本的超链接。When this property is set, the control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text. 你还可以选择设置属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的链接的内容。You can also optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用属性将相同的 URL 绑定到每个节点中，你可以将绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using the property to bind the same URL to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要向其节点时链接到的 URL应用对象时发生。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to link to when a node to which the object is applied is clicked. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要向其节点时链接到的 URL应用对象时发生。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to link to when a node to which the object is applied is clicked. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Booklist.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当属性设置为`true`，节点的子节点的对象应用于获取填充在该节点已展开时的运行时。When the property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 数据绑定中设置的创建时的控制转移到`true`，创建的绑定具有属性设置为`true`。When data bindings are created by setting the of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以声明方式创建的数据绑定都具有属性设置为`false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用声明性语法，可控制各个数据绑定的行为。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. > [!NOTE] > 与不同属性类，属性不需要为定义的事件处理方法事件，如果你正在使用数据源控件，如。Unlike the property of the class, the property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the event, if you are using a data source control, such as . 相反，控件动态生成使用的属性的事件处理方法中的对象集合。Instead, the control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the objects in the collection. 您仍然可以定义的事件处理方法事件; 但是，将调用之后的事件处理方法控件。You can still define an event-handling method for the event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the control. 支持的浏览器还可以利用客户端节点填充。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 如果启用，这将允许控件来填充动态客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，免除回发到服务器的需要。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性指定是否对节点显示一个复选框。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定是否对节点显示一个复选框。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/CS/treenodebindingpopulateondemandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/VB/treenodebindingpopulateondemandvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的值属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于指定在选定节点时，将引发哪些事件。The property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 下表列出可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |`SelectAction` 值`SelectAction` value|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引发事件或事件，根据需要。Raises the event or the event, as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 的节点不呈现其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性指定单击节点时引发的事件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定单击节点时引发的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的值属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于指定窗口，或单击该节点时，要在其中显示的 Web 内容的帧链接到节点。The property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性重写属性到节点的控件应用对象。Setting the property overrides the property of the control for the nodes to which the object is applied. 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性，如果呈现的输出控件必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property, if the rendered output for the control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 当创建可访问网页，应避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定应在新窗口中显示与根节点相关联的 Web 页面。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定应在新窗口中显示与根节点相关联的 Web 页面。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the field name to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于指定一个节点中显示的文本。The property is used to specify the text displayed in a node. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用属性将绑定属性对象移到一个字段，你可以设置属性通过设置的固定值属性。Instead of using the property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can set the property to a fixed value by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果数据源包含多个字段，则必须首先设置或属性或这两个属性以便将绑定到相应的字段。If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the or property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的 XML 元素的属性属性对象应用对象。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的 XML 元素的属性属性对象应用对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Booklist.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的值属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 当鼠标指针置于节点上时，会显示的工具提示文本。The ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the node. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用属性将相同的工具提示文本绑定到每个节点中，你可以将绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using the property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性指定到的节点的工具提示文本应用对象。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip text for a node to which the object is applied. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定到的节点的工具提示文本应用对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip text for a node to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Booklist.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的值属性对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此绑定关系影响所有对象向其应用对象。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 属性用于补充通过将存储到的节点与关联的任何其他数据属性应用对象。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the object is applied. 此值不会显示在控件，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件数据。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 你可以选择性地重写通过设置属性直接每个节点的属性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用属性将相同的值绑定到每个节点中，你可以将绑定属性通过设置数据源的字段的对象属性。Instead of using the property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ##
